item.title: Obsidian for Ontologies
item.description: What if building structured knowledge was as intuitive as taking notes in Obsidian?

item.title: Hypermedia
item.description: Hypermedia, an extension of hypertext, is a nonlinear medium of information that includes graphics, audio, video, plain text and hyperlinks. This designation contrasts with the broader term multimedia, which may include non-interactive linear presentations as well as hypermedia. – Wikipedia - Hypermedia
